name: Hunter
description: Hunters specialize in combating monsters using adaptable tactics chosen to counter specific threats.

3.name: Hunter’s Prey
3.description: You choose a combat tactic such as Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker.

7.name: Defensive Tactics
7.description: You gain a defensive feature such as Escape the Horde or Multiattack Defense.

11.name: Multiattack
11.description: You gain Volley or Whirlwind Attack.

15.name: Superior Hunter’s Defense
15.description: You gain a powerful defensive reaction or resistance.
